Make an example fucntion
```{r}
ghg<- function(element, kg){
  
  if(element == "C"){return(5.077*kg)} 
  
  else if(element == "N2O"){return(624.643*kg)}
  
  else if (element == "CH4"){return(37.333*kg)}
}


```
